random.title: Proudly open source
random.heading: Ready to Elevate Your Career?
random.description: Join thousands of professionals who have transformed their job search

question1.question: Is La-Resume really completely free?
question1.answer: Yes! La-Resume is 100% free and open source. We believe professional resume building should be accessible to everyone.

question2.question: How does the ATS optimization work?
question2.answer: Our templates follow industry best practices for ATS compatibility, including proper keyword placement, clean formatting, and semantic structure.

question3.question: Can I use my own LaTeX templates?
question3.answer: Currently we support our curated templates, but we plan to add custom template support in future updates.

deleteModal.title: Confirm Delete
